description: Tired of your child always removing or losing their gloves or mittens? Make sure they can always find them with these KOMBI mitten clips. Simply clip one end to the mitten or glove cuff and the other end to the jacket sleeve, and voilà! No more lost mitts this winter. These glove clips come in pretty colours to match any snow outfit and are sold in pairs.
name: Mitten Clips - Kids
